world

Class Reporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Reporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reportable

    public class Reporter
extends Object
implements Reportable
    Class which produces a textual report of a model world. Not automatically updated when model state changes. Polls model to obtain current data and state.
    Author:
    Neville (updated by Matthias)
    See Also:
    World

        public void report()
